description: This dataset was compiled during the Chicago Southland Transit Corridor project in 2011. This details parcel-level zoning for a half mile around transit-oriented development areas in the Chicago Southland.

metadata.attribution: South Suburban Mayors and Managers Association

name: SSMMA TOD Zoning
